Title: PPT
Description: 一键获得PPT当前页的图片和回链，以粘贴到obsidian和excalidraw中
Data:
{"LimitSingleInstance":true,"SummaryExpression":"$$","SubPrograms":[],"Variables":[{"Key":"date","Type":0,"Desc":"","DefaultValue":"","SaveState":false,"IsInput":false,"IsOutput":false,"ParamName":"","InputParamInfo":null,"OutputParamInfo":null,"TableDef":null,"CustomType":null,"Group":""},{"Key":"PPTPageNum","Type":0,"Desc":"","DefaultValue":"","SaveState":false,"IsInput":false,"IsOutput":false,"ParamName":"","InputParamInfo":null,"OutputParamInfo":null,"TableDef":null,"CustomType":null,"Group":""},{"Key":"CurrentWindowName","Type":0,"Desc":"","DefaultValue":"","SaveState":false,"IsInput":false,"IsOutput":false,"ParamName":"","InputParamInfo":null,"OutputParamInfo":null,"TableDef":null,"CustomType":null,"Group":""},{"Key":"CurrentFilePath","Type":0,"Desc":"","DefaultValue":"","SaveState":false,"IsInput":false,"IsOutput":false,"ParamName":"","InputParamInfo":null,"OutputParamInfo":null,"TableDef":null,"CustomType":null,"Group":""},{"Key":"UserPath","Type":0,"Desc":"","DefaultValue":"","SaveState":false,"IsInput":false,"IsOutput":false,"ParamName":"","InputParamInfo":null,"OutputParamInfo":null,"TableDef":null,"CustomType":null,"Group":""},{"Key":"EditWindowName","Type":0,"Desc":"","DefaultValue":"","SaveState":false,"IsInput":false,"IsOutput":false,"ParamName":"","InputParamInfo":null,"OutputParamInfo":null,"TableDef":null,"CustomType":null,"Group":""},{"Key":"PathDeleteNum","Type":12,"Desc":"","DefaultValue":"","SaveState":false,"IsInput":false,"IsOutput":false,"ParamName":"","InputParamInfo":null,"OutputParamInfo":null,"TableDef":null,"CustomType":null,"Group":""},{"Key":"EditFilePath","Type":0,"Desc":"","DefaultValue":"","SaveState":false,"IsInput":false,"IsOutput":false,"ParamName":"","InputParamInfo":null,"OutputParamInfo":null,"TableDef":null,"CustomType":null,"Group":""},{"Key":"AssetsPath","Type":0,"Desc":"","DefaultValue":"","SaveState":false,"IsInput":false,"IsOutput":false,"ParamName":"","InputParamInfo":null,"OutputParamInfo":null,"TableDef":null,"CustomType":null,"Group":""},{"Key":"Date","Type":0,"Desc":"","DefaultValue":"","SaveState":false,"IsInput":false,"IsOutput":false,"ParamName":"","InputParamInfo":null,"OutputParamInfo":null,"TableDef":null,"CustomType":null,"Group":""},{"Key":"DesktopPath","Type":0,"Desc":"","DefaultValue":"","SaveState":false,"IsInput":false,"IsOutput":false,"ParamName":"","InputParamInfo":null,"OutputParamInfo":null,"TableDef":null,"CustomType":null,"Group":""},{"Key":"SearchResultNum","Type":12,"Desc":"","DefaultValue":"","SaveState":false,"IsInput":false,"IsOutput":false,"ParamName":"","InputParamInfo":null,"OutputParamInfo":null,"TableDef":null,"CustomType":null,"Group":""}],"Steps":[{"StepRunnerKey":"sys:comment","InputParams":{"note":{"VarKey":null,"Value":"用到了Everything搜索功能，要先运行Everything"}},"OutputParams":{},"IfSteps":null,"ElseSteps":null,"Note":"","Disabled":false,"Collapsed":false,"DelayMs":0},{"StepRunnerKey":"sys:writeClipboard","InputParams":{"type":{"VarKey":null,"Value":"clear"},"successMsg":{"VarKey":null,"Value":""},"stopIfFail":{"VarKey":null,"Value":"1"}},"OutputParams":{"isSuccess":null,"errMessage":null},"IfSteps":null,"ElseSteps":null,"Note":"","Disabled":false,"Collapsed":false,"DelayMs":0},{"StepRunnerKey":"sys:group","InputParams":{"skipErr":{"VarKey":null,"Value":"1"},"skipWhenDebugging":{"VarKey":null,"Value":"0"},"useMultiThread":{"VarKey":null,"Value":"0"}},"OutputParams":{"isSuccess":null,"errorMessage":null},"IfSteps":[{"StepRunnerKey":"sys:comment","InputParams":{"note":{"VarKey":null,"Value":"VBA将图形、整张幻灯片转换为jpg，放到桌面，有同名图片则替代。
png没背景，jpg包含ppt文件的背景。"}},"OutputParams":{},"IfSteps":null,"ElseSteps":null,"Note":"","Disabled":false,"Collapsed":false,"DelayMs":0},{"StepRunnerKey":"sys:officehelper","InputParams":{"operation":{"VarKey":null,"Value":"execVBA"},"appType":{"VarKey":null,"Value":"powerpoint"},"code":{"VarKey":null,"Value":"Sub ExportSelectedShapeAsImageToFolder()

  Dim selectedShape As Shape

  Dim folderPath As String
  
  ' 上面是图形的变量，下面是整张图片的变量

  Dim slideIndex As Integer

  Dim slide As slide

 ' 下面是自定义的时间和文件名的变量

  Dim dateString As String
  
  Dim fileName As String
  
  ' 下面是自定义的页码变量
 
  Dim slideNumber As Integer
  
  Dim objShell As Object

  ' 检查是否选择了一个图形，若选择了，则执行if

  If ActiveWindow.Selection.Type = ppSelectionShapes Then

    Set selectedShape = ActiveWindow.Selection.ShapeRange(1)

    ' 指定保存图形的文件夹路径，根据需求自行修改

    folderPath = Environ$("USERPROFILE") & "\Desktop\"

    ' 将选中的图形转换为图片并保存到指定文件夹
    
    dateString = Format(Date,"yyyymmdd")
    
    fileName = "slide_" & dateString & ".jpg"

    selectedShape.Export folderPath & fileName, ppShapeFormatJPG


' 若没选择图像，则执行else，获取整张图

  Else

    ' 获取当前选定的幻灯片索引

    slideIndex = ActiveWindow.View.Slide.SlideIndex

    ' 选择当前幻灯片

    Set slide = ActivePresentation.Slides(slideIndex)

    ' 将当前幻灯片转换为图片并保存到指定文件夹
    
    dateString = Format(Date,"yyyymmdd")
    
    fileName = "slide_" & dateString & ".jpg"

    slide.Export Environ$("USERPROFILE") & "\Desktop\" & fileName, "JPG"


  End If
  
  ' 获取当前幻灯片的索引（即页码）

  slideNumber = ActiveWindow.View.Slide.SlideIndex
  
  Set objShell = CreateObject("WScript.shell")
  
  objShell.Run "cmd /C echo|set/p=" & slideNumber & "| CLIP", 2

End Sub
